import React, { createContext, useState } from "react"; import { useQuery } from "react-query"; import axios from "axios"; import MakeNotiOpen from "../Functions/MakeNotiOpen"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function () { const UserContext = createContext(); const [numberOfNotification, SetnumberOfUnOpenNotifications] = useState(1); const fetchNotifications = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get( "http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/notifications" ); let numberOfUnOpenNotifications = 0; response.data.notifications.forEach((notificationt) => { if (notificationt.notification.open === "false") { numberOfUnOpenNotifications++; } }); // SetnumberOfUnOpenNotifications(numberOfUnOpenNotifications); localStorage.setItem( "previousNotificationCount", numberOfUnOpenNotifications ); return response.data.notifications; } catch (error) { throw new Error("Network response was not ok"); } }; const { data: notifications, isLoading, error, refetch, } = useQuery("notifications", fetchNotifications); ; const handleRefetch = () => { refetch(); }; if (isLoading) return
